mapper.select: select * from g_board order by bGroup desc, bStep asc
mapper.insert: insert into g_board(bno, bname, btitle, bcontent, bgroup) values (g_seq.nextval, #{bName}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, g_seq.currval)
mapper.update: update g_board set bName = #{bName}, bTitle = #{bTitle}, bContent = #{bContent}, bUpdatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bNo}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from g_board order by bgroup desc, bstep asc) a) where rn > (#{page}-1)*#{max} and rn <= #{page}*#{max}
